Crimes.Crime_Name: Engaging in or instigating the subversion by force of any government
Crimes.National_Security_Element: Involvement with PKK, an organization using armed attacks against the Turkish government
Crimes.National_Security_Danger: Potential threat posed by association with a designated terrorist organization
Crimes.Threat_Assessment: Visa officer determined Suleyman's actions constituted a security risk
Crimes.Risk_Factor: Participation in armed attacks and supply support to the PKK
Crimes.Nature_of_Acts: Providing supplies and participating in armed attacks on Turkish military personnel

Crimes.Crime_Name: Subversion by force of any government
Crimes.Violation_Type: Inadmissibility under immigration law due to membership in a subversive organization
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether Suleyman’s involvement with the PKK constitutes subversion by force under IRPA
Crimes.Governing_Law: Immigration and Refugee Protection Act (IRPA), s. 34(1)(f)
Crimes.Application_Facts: Suleyman admitted assisting the PKK, including during an armed attack

Crimes.Crime_Name: Inadmissible on security grounds for being a member of an organization that there are reasonable grounds to believe engages in subversion by force of any government
Crimes.Admission_or_Involvement: Suleyman admitted to significant involvement with the PKK
Crimes.Individual_Behavior: Assisted in propaganda, supplied materials, and participated in guerrilla activities
Crimes.Nature_of_Membership: Active participation rather than passive affiliation
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Admissions by Suleyman, intelligence reports on PKK activities

Crimes.Crime_Name: Membership in an organization engaging in subversion by force.
Crimes.Legal_Provision_Cited: Immigration and Refugee Protection Act, s. 34(1)(f)
Crimes.Application_Basis: Suleyman’s membership in the PKK formed the basis for inadmissibility
Crimes.Evidence_Assessed: Suleyman’s own admissions about his role in the PKK
Crimes.Decision_Rationale: Reasonable grounds existed to believe the PKK engages in subversion by force
Crimes.Judicial_Review_Outcome: Application for judicial review dismissed by the Federal Court
